data.actual_result: it opens to the Friends tab then jumps to the last viewed server.
data.expected_result: Discord opens to the Friends tab
data.short_description: Reopening Discord after closing it shoots you back to the last server you looked at
data.steps_to_repro: - Select a server - then tap on the friends tab - once you're in the friends tab close discord completely - Reopen Discord and notice you're sent to the Friends tab then the last viewed server.
